title: Spike lag and disconnect so oftern
body: After the Yorick and some small path update, my game can't work well, disconnect from game and spike lag happen so often, i can't play game. Plz fix it

replies.body: Your network may be having trouble maintaining a steady connection, which would result in input delays and an eventual disconnection.  I recommend gong over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection.  This should get you fixed up!
